column1: variable,question_text,description,type,values
consent,"I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.","Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.","categorical","Yes"

question_information_trustworthiness,"I often question whether information I see online is trustworthy.","Frequency of questioning the trustworthiness of online information.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

hard_to_know_what_is_real,"It feels harder than it used to be to know what is real and what is not online.","Perceived difficulty distinguishing what is real online compared with the past.","numeric,"1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

worry_ai_makes_deception_easier,"I worry that AI-generated content makes it easier to deceive people.","Concern that AI-generated content increases the ease of deceiving people.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

feel_overwhelmed_by_conflicting_info,"I feel overwhelmed by the amount of conflicting information online.","Feeling overwhelmed by conflicting information online.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"
unsure_which_sources_to_rely_on,"I often feel unsure which sources to rely on.","Frequency of feeling unsure which information sources to trust.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

difficult_to_detect_manipulated_info,"I find it difficult to tell when information has been manipulated.","Perceived difficulty detecting manipulated information online.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

anxious_when_uncertain_what_to_trust,"Not knowing what to trust makes me feel anxious or uneasy.","Anxiety or unease caused by not knowing what to trust online.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

avoid_online_content_due_to_uncertainty,"I sometimes avoid engaging with online content because I don't know what to believe.","Tendency to avoid online content due to uncertainty about what to believe.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

check_visual_clues_for_ai,"I look for visual clues (lighting, texture, realism) to check if something might be AI-generated.","Use of visual inspection strategies to detect synthetic content.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

check_behavioural_clues_for_ai,"I look for behavioural cues (tone, consistency, human imperfections) to judge authenticity.","Use of behavioural or content cues to assess authenticity.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

confident_identifying_synthetic_signals,"I feel confident noticing details that indicate content may be synthetic.","Self-rated confidence in detecting synthetic or AI-generated signals.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

trust_instinct_real_vs_fake,"I trust my instincts when deciding whether something online is real or fake.","Degree of reliance on intuition when judging authenticity.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

believe_people_struggle_detect_ai_media,"I believe most people would struggle to identify AI-generated media.","Belief about the general public’s ability to detect AI-generated content.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"
confidence_verifying_information,"I feel confident verifying information online.","Self-rated confidence in ability to verify online information.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

double_check_when_unsure,"When I'm unsure, I double-check using other sources.","Tendency to verify information using additional sources when uncertain.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

strategies_for_identifying_unreliable_content,"I have strategies that help me identify unreliable content.","Perceived presence of strategies for identifying unreliable content.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

want_clearer_verification_methods,"I would like clearer ways to verify whether something online is real.","Desire for clearer or more effective methods of verifying online content.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_content_makes_trust_harder,"AI-generated media makes me feel less certain about what is real.","Perception that AI-generated media increases uncertainty about authenticity.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

more_cautious_due_to_ai_media,"The rise of AI-generated media makes me more cautious in my daily life.","Degree to which AI-generated media increases day-to-day caution.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

expect_ai_replace_human_images_voices_interactions,"I expect AI will increasingly replace real human images, voices, and interactions.","Expectation that AI will replace human-generated media and interactions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

recent_moment_questioned_reality,"Describe a recent moment where you questioned whether something online was real or artificially generated.","Open-ended description of a recent experience doubting the authenticity of online content.","text","Free text"

trust_ai_to_act_in_best_interests,"How much do you trust AI systems to act in your best interests?","Level of trust that AI systems act in the participant’s best interests.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"
what_matters_most,"How clear do you feel about what matters most in your life right now?","Self-rated clarity about what matters most in life.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"

digital_life_effect_on_focus,"How much does modern digital life affect your ability to focus, decide, or think clearly?","Perceived impact of digital life on focus, decision-making, and clear thinking.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"

feelings_about_ai_in_decision_making,"How do you feel about the growing role of AI in everyday decision-making?","Overall feeling about the growing role of AI in everyday decisions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"
ai_values_multi,"Which values do you believe AI systems should reflect? (select up to 3)","Values participants believe AI systems should reflect (multi-select).","multi_select",""
age_group,"What is your age group?","Participant age group.","categorical",""
gender,"Which of the following best describes your gender?","Participant gender identity.","categorical",""
country,"Country of residence.","Participant country of residence.","categorical",""
education_level,"What is your highest level of education?","Highest level of education completed.","categorical",""
work_status,"Which of the following best describes your current work status?","Participant employment or occupational status.","categorical",""
daily_hours_online,"On average, how many hours do you spend online each day? (self-estimate)","Estimated number of hours spent online per day.","numeric","Self-estimated hours per day"

ai_tools_frequency,"How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?","Frequency of using AI-powered or digital tools.","categorical",""
emotional_wellbeing,"How would you describe your general emotional wellbeing?","Self-rated emotional wellbeing.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very poor, 7 = Excellent)"
